testcase.name: 1.7.1 - No facts for non-indicated templates
testcase.description: An instance document MUST NOT include business facts which are not contained in any of the reporting units ("templates") that are indicated by the filing indicator elements as reported.

variation.description: XBRL instance with filing indicators identifying templates for which at least one fact is reported.
XBRL instance with a fact that does not appear in any of the templates identified by filing indicators.
XBRL instance with a fact that appears only in a template identified by filing indicators as not reported.
